Annex II Risk Management Requirements

Status: active Topic: social.rights Version: 1

Description

Companies must address serious abuses associated with mineral extraction, direct or indirect support to non-state armed groups, support to public or private security forces, bribery and fraudulent misrepresentation, money laundering, and non-payment of taxes and royalties.

Sub-criteria

  • Serious Abuses Prevention (v1)
  • Non-State Armed Groups (v1)
